bill_title: require certain hospitals to provide prices for certain procedures.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require certain health care facilities to provide prices for certain procedures and tests. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-12E be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any health care facility licensed pursuant to chapter 34-12 shall maintain a price list of the twenty-five most common inpatient and outpatient procedures and tests rendered by the facility. For any inpatient service, the price list shall include a per diem bed charge and an average charge for all ancillary charges. If the per diem bed charge includes all ancillary charges for a procedure, no further information is required. The price list may include a disclaimer regarding changes or other factors that may affect actual charges for services rendered. Any health care facility licensed pursuant to chapter 34-12 shall also maintain a price list of the twenty-five procedures and tests that yield the most in gross receipts each year. The price list may include a disclaimer regarding changes or other factors that may affect actual charges for services rendered. The facility shall distribute the price lists on a publicly accessible site on the internet. Upon request by a consumer, the facility shall provide the price lists by first class mail or electronic mail, as requested. Section 2. For the purposes of this Act, the term, price, is that amount that a facility would expect to charge any patient for the procedure or test. The price shall also include the median price for the procedure or test over the last twelve months.

bill_versions.bill_version: House Health and Human Services Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require certain hospitals to provide prices for certain procedures. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-12E be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any hospital licensed pursuant to chapter 34-12, other than a critical access hospital, shall maintain a price list of the twenty-five most common inpatient diagnostic-related group and principal procedures and the twenty-five most common outpatient principal surgical procedures rendered by the hospital. The price list may include a disclaimer regarding changes or other factors that may affect actual charges for services rendered. Any hospital licensed pursuant to chapter 34-12, other than a critical access hospital, shall also maintain a price list of the twenty-five inpatient diagnostic-related group and principal procedures and the twenty-five outpatient principal surgical procedures that yield the most gross receipts each year. The price list may include a disclaimer regarding changes or other factors that may affect actual charges for services rendered. The hospital shall distribute the price lists on a publicly accessible site on the internet. Upon request by a consumer, the hospital shall provide the price lists by first class mail or electronic mail, as requested. Section 2. For the purposes of this Act, the term, price, is that amount that a hospital would expect to charge for the inpatient diagnostic-related group and principal procedures and outpatient principal surgical procedures. The price shall also include the median price for the procedures over the last calendar year.
